Name: Focus Energy
Effects: Attacks are critical hits on natural 18-20

Name: Super Luck
Effects: Attacks are critical hits on natural 18-20

Name: Adaptability
Effects: Moves that are the same type as you deal +4 damage.

Name: Aerilate
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Flying-type moves.

Name: Aftermath
Effects: When knocked out by a melee attack, the attacker loses 1d20 HP.

Name: Analytic
Effects: When attacking a foe who has already acted this round, deal +4 damage.

Name: Anger Point
Effects: When hit by a critical hit, raise Attack +6 for 10 mins. This passive does not stack.

Name: Aroma Veil
Effects: You and your allies within 10ft of you are immune to the effects of the moves Heal Block, Taunt, Encore, and Disable and the passive Cursed Body.

Name: Battery
Effects: Allies within 15 ft of you have +1 Special Attack.

Name: Battle Armor
Effects: Critical hits are treated as normal hits against you.

Name: Battle Bond
Effects: Mega Greninja’s Water Shuriken’s base damage changes from 1d4 to 1d10.

Name: Berserk
Effects: While below half HP, you have +2 Special Attack.

Name: Big Pecks
Effects: Your Defense cannot be lowered by a foe’s effects.

Name: Blaze
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Fire type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Centered Focus
Effects: Mega Gallade is immune to being Stunned. Mega Gallade has +2 more Defense.

Name: Cheek Pouch
Effects: Whenever you consume a berry, you recover 10 HP in addition to any other effects.

Name: Chlorophyll
Effects: While in Sunny Weather, your Speed is +2.

Name: Clear Body
Effects: Your stats cannot be lowered by a foe’s effects.

Name: Cloud Nine
Effects: As a free action you may deplete one use of Defog and use Defog.,

Name: Color Change
Effects: Whenever you are attacked, your type is changed to the same type as the attack after taking damage and effects.

Name: Comatose
Effects: You are always Asleep but can still act as if you aren’t. You are also immune to other afflictions.

Name: Competitive
Effects: If a foe lowers any of your stats, you have +2 Special Attack until your lowered stats are returned to normal.

Name: Compound Eyes
Effects: Add +1 during accuracy check whenever you use a ranged attack.

Name: Corrosion
Effects: You can Poison and Toxify Steel-types and Poison-types.

Name: Curious Medicine
Effects: Your stats and your adjacent ally’s stats cannot be lowered by a foe’s effects.

Name: Cursed Body
Effects: When you are hit by a foe’s melee attack, disable that attack for 10 mins. Cursed Body can only affect one attack at a time.

Name: Cute Charm
Effects: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, Infatuate the attacker.

Name: Damp
Effects: Explosion, Misty Explosion, and Self-Destruct fail to do anything if used within 40ft of you.

Name: Dazzling
Effects: You may not be targeted by Priority moves that are being used out of turn order.

Name: Defeatist
Effects: When your HP is below half of your max hit points, your stats are all -2.

Name: Defiant
Effects: If a foe lowers any of your stats, you have +2 Attack until your lowered stats are returned to normal.

Name: Disguise
Effects: The first time you are hit with an attack each encounter, the attack is negated.

Name: Download
Effects: Your Attack is +1 against targets with lower Special Defense than Defense. Your Special Attack is +1 against targets with lower Defense than Special Defense.

Name: Drizzle
Effects: As a free action you may deplete one use of Rain Dance and use Rain Dance.

Name: Drought
Effects: As a free action you may deplete one use of Sunny Day and use Sunny Day.

Name: Dry Skin
Effects: In sunny weather, you lose 4 HP at the end of your actions. In rainy weather, you recover 4 HP at the end of your actions. You are immune to Water-type attacks.

Name: Early Bird
Effects: You roll twice during checks to wake from Sleep and use the higher result.

Name: Effect Spore
Effects: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, randomly either Paralyze, Poison, or put to Sleep the attacker.

Name: Electric Surge
Effects: As a free action you may deplete one use of Electric Terrain and use Electric Terrain.

Name: Emergency Exit
Effects: You cannot fight when first damaged below half of Max HP. You will want to run away or return to a Poke Ball for 2 rounds. During those two rounds, your speed is doubled.

Name: Exposed
Effects: When you use a move or attack, you have –8 Defense and –8 Special Defense until your next turn. You also deal –8 damage with all attacks before applying weakness and resistance), Sturdy (If you would be brought from Max HP to 0 or below, you are instead brought to 1 HP.

Name: Filter
Effects: Super-effective attacks against you deal -4 damage after applying weakness.

Name: Flame Body
Effects: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, Burn the attacker.

Name: Flare Boost
Effects: While Burned, your Special Attack is +4.

Name: Flash Fire
Effects: You are immune to Fire-type attacks. If you would be hit by a Fire-type attack, your Fire type attacks deal +4 damage for 2 mins.

Name: Flower Gift
Effects: While Cherrim is in Sunny Weather, Cherrim’s Attack and Special Defense is +6

Name: Flower Veil
Effects: You and your allied Grass-type’s stats cannot be lowered by effects within 25ft of you.

Name: Fluffy
Effects: If hit by a melee attack, you only take half the damage. If hit by a Fire-type attack, you take twice the damage.

Name: Forecast
Effects: Your appearance and type changes with the weather. In Hailing, Hazy, or Misty weather, Castform is Ice-type. In Raining weather, Castform is Water-type. In Sandstorming weather, Castform is Rock-type. In Sunny weather, Castform is Fire-type.

Name: Friend Guard
Effects: Allies within 25ft of you take -1d4 damage when attacked.

Name: Fur Coat
Effects: If hit by a move using the Attack stat, you only take half the damage you would take.

Name: Gale Wings
Effects: If you use a Flying Type Move during your turn, your Speed is +2 until your next turn.

Name: Galvanize
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Electric-type moves.

Name: Gooey
Effects: Contact with you lowers the attacker's Speed by -2 for 10 mins. This effect does not stack.

Name: Grass Pelt
Effects: While in Grassy Terrain, your Defense is +2.

Name: Grassy Surge
Effects: As a free action you may deplete one use of Grassy Terrain and use Grassy Terrain.

Name: Gulp Missile
Effects: Whenever Cramorant goes underwater, it gathers waste in its mouth. When hit by an attack within 30ft while Cramorant has waste, Cramorant ejects the waste at the offender, dealing 4 damage or 8 damage if Cramorant has less than 20 HP

Name: Guts
Effects: While afflicted, your Attack is +2.

Name: Harvest
Effects: When using a Berry, you only use half of it while still gaining its full effects. You can only use half of a Berry if you have Harvest.

Name: Healer
Effects: After acting, you may roll 1d20. On 16 or higher, any adjacent allies are cured of all afflictions.

Name: Heatproof
Effects: Fire-type attacks are resisted by you. If you are already resistant to Fire-type, half any Fire-type attack’s damage again.

Name: Hunger Switch
Effects: Whenever Morpeko acts, it changes from Full Belly mode to Hangry mode or back into Full Belly mode from Hangry mode. Aura Wheel is Electric-type in Full Belly mode, Aura Wheel is Dark-type in Hangry mode.

Name: Hydration
Effects: While in Raining weather, you are cured of any afflictions.

Name: Hyper Cutter
Effects: Your Attack cannot be lowered by a foe’s effects.

Name: Ice Body
Effects: If in Hailing weather, you recover 4 HP during your action and you don’t take damage from Hailing weather.

Name: Ice Face
Effects: The first time you are hit with a melee attack each encounter; the attack is negated. Ice Face is reset whenever it starts Hailing while you are within its area of effect.

Name: Ice Scales
Effects: If hit by a Special Attack, you only take half the damage you would take.

Name: Illusion
Effects: As a free action, you may change your appearance to look like any Pokémon you have interacted with within the past hour. You may not appear as a Pokémon more than twice your size and the illusion is dropped when you are hit by an attack.

Name: Immunity
Effects: You are immune to getting Poisoned and Toxified.

Name: Imposter
Effects: As a free action you may use Transform.

Name: Infiltrator
Effects: Hindering terrain and Walls do not affect you or your attacks.

Name: Innards Out
Effects: When you are knocked out by a melee attack, deal damage to the attacker equal to the damage you just took.

Name: Inner Focus
Effects: You are immune to being Stunned.

Name: Insomnia
Effects: You are immune to being put to Sleep.

Name: Iron Barbs
Effects: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, the attacker takes 4 damage.

Name: Iron Fist
Effects: Your punching attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Justified
Effects: When a foe hits you with a Dark-type attack, your Attack is +1 for 10 mins.

Name: Keen Eye
Effects: Your accuracy checks cannot be negatively affected by foes.

Name: Leaf Guard
Effects: While in sunny weather, you are cured of any afflictions.

Name: Levitate
Effects: You are immune to Ground-type moves while you are airborne.

Name: Libero
Effects: You may change your type to the same type as an attack you are making while making it for 10 mins.

Name: Lightning Rod
Effects: Any foe’s ranged Electric-type attacks within 25ft or any adjacent foe’s Electric-type attacks are negated and drawn to you. Your Special Attack is +2 until the end of your next turn whenever you negate an Electric-type attack

Name: Limber
Effects: You are immune to being Paralyzed.

Name: Liquid Ooze
Effects: If you are hit by an attack that damages you and heals the attacker, the attacker is dealt damage equal to what they would have healed, instead of healing.

Name: Liquid Voice
Effects: Sound-based moves made by you are Water-type.

Name: Long Reach
Effects: Your melee ranged attacks all have a range of 25ft, and are still melee attacks.

Name: Magic Bounce
Effects: If you are hit by an attack that does not deal damage, the attacker is instead affected by the effects of their own attack.

Name: Magic Guard
Effects: You can only take damage from attacks that deal damage. You are unaffected by damage from afflictions, coats, hazards, weather or any passives.

Name: Magician
Effects: When hitting with a melee attack, you steal the target’s held item, if any.

Name: Mega Adaptability
Effects: Moves that are the same type as Mega Beedrill or Mega Lucario deal +8 damage.

Name: Magma Armor
Effects: You are immune being Frozen.

Name: Marvel Scale
Effects: While afflicted, your Defense is +2.

Name: Mega Cannon
Effects: Mega Blastoise’s ranged attacks deal +8 damage.

Name: Mega Filter
Effects: Super-effective attacks against Mega Aggron deal -1d20 damage.

Name: Mega Healer
Effects: After acting, Mega Audino may roll 1d20. On 7 or higher, any adjacent allies are cured of all afflictions

Name: Mega Intimidate
Effects: Mega Manectric has +4 more Defense

Name: Mega Jaw
Effects: Mega Sharpedo’s biting attacks deal +8 damage.

Name: Mega Launcher
Effects: Your pulse attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Mega Shell Armor
Effects: Critical hits are treated as normal hits against Mega Slowbro. Mega Slowbro has +2 more Defense.

Name: Mega Skill Link
Effects: Mega Heracross’s scatter moves get to be completely used, even if you miss you may still attempt each possible attack.

Name: Mega Technician
Effects: When rolling damage, replace any rolled 1s, 2s, or 3s with 4s.

Name: Merciless
Effects: On hit, your attacks are critical hits if the target is Poisoned or Toxified.

Name: Mettle
Effects: Your attacks cannot be redirected by passives or any other ability, instead only hitting a target your attack was directed at.

Name: Mimicry
Effects: Your Type changes to reflect your current surroundings. If you are in a grassy field, Grass type; if you are in water, Water type; if you are on a mountain, Rock type; etc.

Name: Minus
Effects: If at least one ally has Plus or Minus within 10ft you, you have +3 Special Attack.

Name: Mirror Armor
Effects: If your stats would be lowered by a foe’s effects, instead that offender’s stat is lowered.

Name: Misty Surge
Effects: As a free action you may deplete one use of Misty Terrain and use Misty Terrain.

Name: Mold Breaker
Effects: Your attacks ignore any passives that would redirect, negate or weaken your attacks.

Name: Motor Drive
Effects: Any Electric-type attack that hits you is negated and your speed is +1 for 10 mins.

Name: Multiscale
Effects: When you are at Max HP, you take -4 damage from all attacks.

Name: Mummy
Effects: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, the not-Stat passives of the attacker become Mummy for 10 mins.

Name: Natural Cure
Effects: Whenever returned to a Poke Ball, you are cured of any afflictions.

Name: Neutralizing Gas
Effects: Non-Stat passives other than your own do not work within 10ft of you.

Name: No Guard
Effects: You cannot miss your attacks, and attacks made against you cannot miss.

Name: Normalize
Effects: Attacks performed by you are treated as Normal-type attacks.

Name: Oblivious
Effects: You are immune to Infatuation.

Name: Overcoat
Effects: You are immune to damage from weather.

Name: Overgrow
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Grass-type attacks deal +4 damage

Name: Own Tempo
Effects: You are immune to being Confused.

Name: Parental Bond
Effects: After attacking, Mega Kangaskhan may immediately make the same attack again. If they hit with the second attack, do not add any die rolls to your damage, instead only using your modifier and any non-dice bonuses as damage.

Name: Pastel Veil
Effects: You and your allies within 10ft of you are immune to being Poisoned or Toxified.

Name: Perish Body
Effects: When you are hit by a melee attack, the offender receives 3 Perish Coats. The Coat has the following ability: After acting, destroy one of your Perish Coats. If this is the third Perish coat you’ve destroyed during this encounter, set your HP to 0.

Name: Pickpocket
Effects: When you are hit by a melee attack, you steal the offender’s held item, if any.

Name: Pixilate
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Fairy-type moves.

Name: Plus
Effects: If at least one ally has Plus or Minus within 10ft you, you have +3 Special Attack.

Name: Poison Heal
Effects: While afflicted with Poison or Toxification, you are healed instead of damaged by those afflictions. You are cured of Poison or Toxin once you are at Max HP.

Name: Poison Point
Effects: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, Poison the attacker.

Name: Poison Touch
Effects: Whenever you hit with a melee attack, you may roll 1d6. On 6, Poison the target.

Name: Power of Alchemy
Effects: When an ally is knocked out within 10ft of you, you gain one of your ally’s passives for 2 mins.

Name: Power Spot
Effects: Attacks made within 10ft of you deal +4 damage, regardless if the attacker is friend or foe.

Name: Prankster
Effects: Your attacks that do not deal damage on hit have Priority.

Name: Pressure
Effects: If you are hit by a 3/day attack, the attacker can’t use that attack for the remainder of the day.

Name: Propeller Tail
Effects: Your attacks cannot be redirected by passives or any other ability, instead only hitting a target your attack was directed at.

Name: Protean
Effects: You may change your type to the same type as an attack you are making while making it for 10 mins.

Name: Psychic Surge
Effects: As a free action you may deplete one use of Psychic Terrain and use Psychic Terrain.

Name: Punk Rock
Effects: Your sound-based attacks deal +4 damage. You take 4 less damage from sound-based attacks.

Name: Purest Power
Effects: Mega Medicham has +4 More Attack

Name: Queenly Majesty
Effects: You may not be targeted by Priority moves that are being used out of turn order.

Name: Quick Draw
Effects: 1/day, you may give one of your moves priority.

Name: Quick Feet
Effects: While afflicted, your Speed is +2.

Name: Rain Dish
Effects: If in Raining Weather, you regain 4 HP after you act.

Name: Rattled
Effects: When a foe hits you with a Bug-type, Ghost-type, or Dark-type attack, your Speed is +1 for 10 mins.

Name: Receiver
Effects: When an ally is knocked out within 10ft of you, you gain one of your ally’s passives for 2 mins.

Name: Reckless
Effects: Your attacks that damage yourself on hit, deal +4 damage.

Name: Receiver
Effects: When an ally is knocked out within 10ft of you, you gain one of your ally’s passives for 2 mins.

Name: Recycle
Effects: When using a Berry, you only use half of it while still gaining its full effects. You can only use half of a Berry if you have Recycle.

Name: Refrigerate
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Ice-type moves.

Name: Regenerator
Effects: When returned to a Poke Ball, you recover to Max HP after being stored for 1 hour.

Name: Ripen
Effects: When you use a Berry, double any effects it has.

Name: Rock Head
Effects: Your attacks that damage yourself on hit do not damage yourself.

Name: Rough Skin
Effects: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, the attacker takes 4 damage.

Name: Sand Force
Effects: While in Sandstorming Weather, your Rock-type and Ground-type attacks deal +4 damage and you don’t take damage from Sandstorming weather.

Name: Sand Power
Effects: While in Sandstorming Weather, Mega Garchomp’s Rock-type and Ground-type attacks deal +8 damage.

Name: Sand Rush
Effects: While in Sandstorming Weather, Your Speed is +2 and you don’t take damage from Sandstorming weather.

Name: Sand Spit
Effects: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, use Sandstorm as a free action.

Name: Sand Veil
Effects: While in Sandstorming Weather, any foe’s attacks made against you have -1 during accuracy check and you don’t take damage from Sandstorming weather.

Name: Sand Stream
Effects: As a free action you may deplete one use of Sandstorm and use Sandstorm.

Name: Sand Vortex
Effects: As a free action Mega Tyranitar may use Sandstorm, even if it’s not on their move list.

Name: Sap Sipper
Effects: You are immune to Grass-type attacks. If you would be hit by a Grass-type attack, your Attack is +1 for 10 mins

Name: Schooling
Effects: When Wishiwashi is at half its HP or higher, it is in its School form. In its School form, Wishiwashi summons hundreds of fish-shaped balls of water and surrounds itself making it appear larger and making it stronger. When below 15 HP, Wishiwashi is in its Single form, dropping its façade and appearing much smaller on its own.

Name: Scrappy
Effects: Your Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can hit Ghost-type targets.

Name: Screen Cleaner
Effects: Whenever you move through a Wall, Hazard, or adjacent to someone with a Coat, destroy all Walls, Hazards and Coats.

Name: Shadow Pull
Effects: Foes within 10ft of Mega Gengar cannot move away from you

Name: Shed Skin
Effects: After acting, you may roll 1d4. On 4, you are cured of any afflictions.

Name: Sheerest Force
Effects: Mega Camerupt’s attacks that have additional effects that affect the target may deal +1d20 damage, but will not have those additional effects.

Name: Sheer Force
Effects: Your attacks that have additional effects that affect the target may deal +4 damage, but will not have those additional effects.

Name: Shell Armor
Effects: Critical hits are treated as normal hits against you

Name: Shields Down
Effects: When your HP is below half of your max hit points, your form changes to Core Form and your stats change. While Minior is not in its Core Revealed from, it is immune to afflictions

Name: Shield Dust
Effects: You are unaffected by additional effects from attacks that deal damage.

Name: Skill Link
Effects: Your scatter moves have +2 during Accuracy Check.

Name: Speed Purity
Effects: Mega Blaziken has +4 more Speed

Name: Slush Rush
Effects: While in Hailing weather, your Speed is +2 and you don’t take damage from Hailing weather.

Name: Sniper
Effects: When you land a critical hit, you deal an additional 8 damage, applied before weakness and resistances.

Name: Snow Cloak
Effects: While in Hailing weather, any foe’s attacks made against you have -1 during Accuracy Check and you don’t take damage from Hailing weather

Name: Snow Front
Effects: While in Hailing Weather, Mega Abomasnow’s Ice-type attacks deal +1d8 damage.

Name: Snow Warning
Effects: As a free action you may deplete one use of Hail and use Hail.

Name: Solar Energy
Effects: While in Sunny weather, Mega Houndoom deals an additional 8 damage while attacking.

Name: Solar Power
Effects: While in Sunny weather, you deal an additional 4 damage while attacking. After acting in Sunny weather, you take 4 damage.

Name: Solid Rock
Effects: Super-effective attacks against you deal -4 damage after applying weakness.

Name: Soul-Heart
Effects: When an ally is knocked out within 10ft of you, your Special Attack is +1 for 10 mins.

Name: Soundproof
Effects: You are immune to sound-based attacks, like Boomburst, Bug Buzz, Chatter, Clanging Scales, Disarming Voice, Echoed Voice, Eerie Spell, Grass Whistle, Hyper Voice, Overdrive, Perish Song, Roar, Round, Sing, Snore, Sparkling Aria, Supersonic, Uproar

Name: Stakeout
Effects: When you attack a target who has just joined the encounter since your last turn, you deal +4 damage.

Name: Stance Change
Effects: Aegislash has two forms it constantly changes between. When you attack a foe, before making your accuracy check change into your Sword Form. When using a reaction move such as King’s Shield or Protect, or a protective move like Safeguard or Light Screen, immediately change to Shield Form.

Name: Static
Effects: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, Paralyze the attacker.

Name: Steadfast
Effects: When you are Stunned, your Speed is +1 for 10 mins.

Name: Steam Engine
Effects: When a foe hits you with a Fire-type or Water-type attack, your Speed is +2 for 10 mins.

Name: Steel Force
Effects: While in Sandstorming Weather, Mega Steelix’s Rock-type and Ground-type attacks deal +8 damage.

Name: Steelworker
Effects: Your Steel-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Steely Spirit
Effects: Steel-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Name: Stench
Effects: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, Stun the attacker

Name: Sticky Hold
Effects: You cannot drop held items or have held items stolen from you.

Name: Storm Drain
Effects: Any foe’s ranged Water-type attacks within 25ft or any adjacent foe’s Water-type attacks are negated and drawn to you. Your Special Attack is +2 until the end of your next turn whenever you negate an Water-type attack.

Name: Strong Jaw
Effects: Your biting attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Sturdy
Effects: If you would be brought from Max HP to 0 or below, you are instead brought to 1 HP.

Name: Suction Cups
Effects: You cannot be moved by a foe’s attacks.

Name: Surge Surfer
Effects: While in Electrified terrain, your Speed is +2.

Name: Swarm
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Bug-type attacks deal +4 damage

Name: Sweet Veil
Effects: You and your allies within 10ft of you are immune to being put to Sleep.

Name: Swifter Swim
Effects: While in Raining weather, Mega Swampert’s Speed is +4.

Name: Swift Swim
Effects: While in Raining weather, your Speed is +2.

Name: Symbiosis
Effects: You can pass held items to allies within 10ft as a free action.

Name: Synchronize
Effects: When you are Burned, Poisoned, Paralyzed, or Toxified by a foe, the offender is also given the same affliction.

Name: Tangled Feet
Effects: While you are confused, foes need to roll +1 during Accuracy Checks against you.

Name: Technician
Effects: When rolling damage, replace any rolled 1s or 2s with 3s.

Name: Telepathy
Effects: Your allies within 25ft do not harm you when the ally is using attacks that have an area of effect.

Name: Thick Fat
Effects: You take -4 damage from Fire-type attacks and Ice-type attacks.

Name: Thicker Fat
Effects: Mega Venusaur takes –6 damage from Fire-type and Ice-type attacks after applying weaknesses and resistance.

Name: Tinted Lens
Effects: Your resisted attacks deal +4 damage after applying weaknesses and resistance.

Name: Torrent
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Water-type attacks deal +4 damage

Name: Tough Claws
Effects: Your slashing attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Tough Claws and Fangs
Effects: Mega Charizard X’s, Mega Aeridactyl's, and Mega Metagross's slashing and biting attacks deal +8 damage.

Name: Toxic Boost
Effects: If you would have been Poisoned or Toxified you are not and your Attack is +2 for 2 mins. This effect does not stack

Name: Trace
Effects: If Mega Alakazam is affected by a foe’s passive, Mega Alakazam gains that passive until you lose Trace.

Name: Triage
Effects: Any moves you know that can heal have Reaction.

Name: Truant
Effects: You can’t act on a round after a round where you have acted. Truant cannot be removed or disabled by any means.

Name: Unnerve
Effects: Foes within 25ft of you cannot consume food.

Name: Very Limber
Effects: Mega Lopunny are immune to being Paralyzed. Mega Lopunny has +2 more Speed

Name: Vital Spirit
Effects: You are immune to being put to Sleep.

Name: Volt Absorb
Effects: When you are hit by an electric-type attack, half the damage, then you heal that much HP instead of taking damage.

Name: Wandering Spirit
Effects: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, you gain all of the offender’s Not-Stat passives and lose Wandering Spirit, then they gain Wandering Spirit and lose all of their Not-Stat Passives for 10 mins.

Name: Water Absorb (Maractus)
Effects: When you negate a water-type attack, heal half the amount of damage your would have taken if you had not negated the attack.

Name: Water Absorb
Effects: When you are hit by a water-type attack, half the damage, then you heal that much HP instead of taking damage.

Name: Water Bubble
Effects: You take -4 damage from Fire-type attacks. You add +4 damage to Water-type attacks. You are immune to being Burned.

Name: Water Compaction
Effects: When a foe hits you with a Water-type attack, your Defense is +2 for 10 mins.

Name: Water Veil
Effects: You are immune to being Burned.

Name: Weak Armor
Effects: When you are hit by a melee attack, Your Defense is -3 and your Speed is +3 for 10 mins. This does not stack.

Name: White Smoke
Effects: Your stats cannot be lowered by a foe’s effects.

Name: Wonder Guard
Effects: Shedinja is immune to attacks that are not super-effective. Wonder Guard cannot be removed or disabled by any means.

Name: Wonder Skin
Effects: Your stats cannot be lowered by a foe’s effects.

Name: Zen Mode
Effects: Darmanitan changes to its Zen Form when it is below half of its max HP.

Name: All Out
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Fighting-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Blaze
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Fire-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Deep Freeze
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Ice-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Dimming Light
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Dark-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Dreaded
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Ghost-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Freefall
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Flying-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Last Chance
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Normal-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Mind Fortress
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Psychic-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Overdose
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Poison-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Overgrow
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Grass-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Shattering
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Rock-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Sinkhole
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Ground-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Sparking
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Electric-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Spritespell
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Fairy-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Swarm
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Bug-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Torrent
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Water-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Unbreakable
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Steel-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Wyrmflare
Effects: When you are below 20 HP, your Dragon-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Aerilate
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Flying-type moves.

Name: Darken
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Dark-type moves.

Name: Draconize
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Dragon-type attacks.

Name: Inflariate
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Fire-type moves.

Name: Galvanize
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Electric-type moves.

Name: Granitize
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Rock-type attacks.

Name: Hydrate
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Water-type moves.

Name: Martialize
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Fighting-type moves.

Name: Metalcoating
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Steel-type moves.

Name: Normalize
Effects: Attacks performed by you are treated as Normal-type attacks.

Name: Pixilate
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Fairy-type moves.

Name: Plantify
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Grass-type moves.

Name: Psionate
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Psychic-type attacks.

Name: Quakate
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Ground-type attacks.

Name: Refrigerate
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Ice-type moves.

Name: Scuttlize
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Bug-type attacks.

Name: Spookify
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Ghost-type attacks.

Name: Toxicate
Effects: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Poison-type moves.

Effects: Your Normal-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Effects: Your Ice-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Effects: Your Fighting-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Effects: Your Bug-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Effects: Your Poison-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Effects: Your Ghost-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Effects: Your Steel-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Effects: Your Rock-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Watery
Effects: Your Water-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Winged
Effects: Your Flying-type attacks deal +4 damage.

Name: Buggy Spirit
Effects: Bug-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Name: Dark Spirit
Effects: Dark-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Name: Draconian Spirit
Effects: Dragon-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Name: Fairy Spirit
Effects: Fairy-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Name: Fiery Spirit
Effects: Fire-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Name: Fighting Spirit
Effects: Fighting-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Name: Flighty Spirit
Effects: Flying-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Name: Ghastly Spirit
Effects: Ghost-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Effects: Grass-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Effects: Ground-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Effects: Ice-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Name: Normy Spirit
Effects: Poison-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Effects: Poison-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Name: Psychy Spirit
Effects: Psychic-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Name: Rocky Spirit
Effects: Rock-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Name: Steely Spirit
Effects: Steel-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Name: Watery Spirit
Effects: Water-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Name: Zappy Spirit
Effects: Electric-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

Name: Alacrity
Effects: Your Speed cannot be lowered by a foe’s effects.

Name: Benefactor
Effects: If any ally is knocked out within 10ft of you, you gain any temporary stat bonuses they had until those bonuses would expire.

Name: Carry On
Effects: Whenever an ally is knocked out, recover 1d6 HP.

Name: Close Quarters
Effects: Add +1 during accuracy check whenever you use a melee attack.

Name: Critastrophe
Effects: Your critical hits deal double the result of your rolled damage instead of dealing the maximum result possible.

Name: Dauntless
Effects: Your Special Attack cannot be lowered by a foe’s effects.

Name: Devious Entrance
Effects: As a free action you may deplete one use of Toxic Spikes and use Toxic Spikes.

Name: Dynamic Entry
Effects: You have +3 to your first accuracy check each combat.

Name: Enduring
Effects: You can only be knocked out when you are at 1 HP.

Name: Escape Artist
Effects: You are immune to being bound and cannot have your movement restricted.

Name: Gassy
Effects: As a free action you may deplete one use of Smoke Screen and use Smoke Screen.

Name: Gravitoid
Effects: As a free action you may deplete one use of Stealth Rock and use Stealth Rock.

Name: Gritty
Effects: While afflicted, you have +1 Defense and +1 Special Defense.

Name: Haymaker
Effects: When calculating damage, apply your relevant modifier twice.

Name: Herald
Effects: If any allies within 10ft have no stat passives, they have your stat passives.

Name: Impervious
Effects: Your stats cannot be lowered.

Name: Jackstones
Effects: As a free action you may deplete one use of Spikes and use Spikes.

Name: Last Breath
Effects: When knocked out by an attack, all adjacent allies recover 1d12 HP.

Name: No Quarter
Effects: Your attacks made against Stunned or bound target deal +4 damage.

Name: Reformation
Effects: The first time you take damage during combat, recover 1d12 HP.

Name: Resilience
Effects: You cannot receive any afflictions if you’ve already been cured of an affliction during the same combat.

Name: Resistance Up
Effects: While below half HP, you have +2 Special Defense.

Name: Restoration
Effects: Whenever you recover HP, recover an additional 1d6 HP.

Name: Ridicure
Effects: Whenever a foe fails to hit an attack where you were a possible target, recover 1d4 HP.

Name: Sand Shelter
Effects: You take no damage from Sandstorming weather.

Name: Shields Up
Effects: While below half HP, you have +2 Defense.

Name: Side Effects
Effects: When attacking a foe who recovered HP since your last turn, you deal +1d12 damage on hit.

Name: Snow Shelter
Effects: You take no damage from Hailing weather.

Name: Stalwart
Effects: Your Special Defense cannot be lowered by a foe’s effects.

Name: Standfast
Effects: While Stunned, you have +3 Defense and +3 Special Defense.

Name: Viral
Effects: When you successfully afflict a target, any adjacent foes are also afflicted with the same affliction.

Name: Unyielding
Effects: If you at half of your max HP or less, you cannot take more than 20 damage at a time.

Name: Genesis Panic
Effects: When your HP is at 40 or less HP, all of your attacks become At-Will frequency. If you use a move that you normally would not be able to use any more per day due to its frequency, you lose 1d12 HP when you use it.

Name: Mindslaver
Effects: When Mewtwo hits with a Psychic-type attack, the target must make a Concentration skill check of 11 or higher (Pokémon roll without adding anything). If they fail, Mewtwo may choose to deal no damage with the attack but now decides how the target acts on their turns until they make a Concentration Skill check of 16 or higher on their turn or Mewtwo dismisses them from control.

Name: Beast Boost
Effects: Whenever you knock out a foe, your highest stat is raised +1 for 10 mins.

Name: RKS System
Effects: Silvally changes its type depending on which Memory is held by Silvally

Name: Folding Form
Effects: Once per turn as a free action, Genesect can change into its Folded Form or back into its regular form. While in its aerodynamic Folded Form, its Speed is 25, but Genesect cannot attack.

Name: Force Field
Effects: +5 Defense, +5 Special Defense

Name: Birds of Legend
Effects: You are compelled to compete for dominance in the presence of other Birds of Legend.

Name: Legendary Sprint
Effects: If you move in one direction for more than 100 ft, your Speed becomes 30 until you change direction or stop. While moving at this speed, you may run over any terrain.

Name: Guardian Deity
Effects: When at the post you are guarding (temple, shrine, sacred ground), you take 10 less damage from any attack.

Name: Guardian Sync
Effects: When you are with at least one other Guardian and at least one ally’s Guardian Deity is active, your HP is 420.

Name: Swords of Justice
Effects: Whenever you are fighting alongside another Sword of Justice, your attacks deal +6 damage. In addition, your Defense and Special Defense is +1 for each other Sword of Justice you are fighting alongside.

Name: Force of Nature
Effects: As a free action, you may change into your Therian Form, or change back into your Incarnate Form.

Name: Hex Nut Fist
Effects: Your punching attacks deal +8 damage.

Name: Legendary Flight
Effects: If you move in one direction for more than 100 ft, your Speed becomes 30 until you change direction or stop.

Name: Legendary Titans
Effects: When gathered with at least two other Legendary Titans, Regigigas is compelled to awaken if nearby.

Name: Transistor
Effects: Electric-type attacks used within 100ft of you deal +8 damage.

Name: Dragon's Maw
Effects: Dragon-type attacks used within 100ft of you deal +8 damage.

Name: Monstrous Strength
Effects: Regigigas can move mountains by shoving them as quickly as it can move.

Name: Slow Start
Effects: At the beginning of each of its turns, Regigigas gets +2 Attack, +2 Special Attack, and +2 Speed unless those stats are at 20 or higher. Then, if Regigigas uses Giga Impact or Hyper Beam while any of its stats are at 20 or higher, its Attack, Special Attack, and Speed are reset to 2 each and all of its frequencies are refreshed as if Regigigas has taken a long rest.

Name: Master of Birds
Effects: You are compelled to quell fighting between Articuno, Zapdos, and Moltres.

Name: Guardian Multiscale
Effects: When you are above half Max HP, you take -1d20 damage from all attacks.

Name: Master of Beasts
Effects: You are compelled to protect Raikou, Entei, and Suicune when any of them are in danger and you are nearby.

Name: Prince of the Sea
Effects: You are compelled to protect the ocean.

Name: Guardian of the Forest
Effects: You are compelled to protect forests.

Name: Victory Star
Effects: +5 to accuracy checks

Name: Sky Warrior
Effects: As a free action, you may change into your Sky Form, or change back into your Land Form.

Name: Chilling Neigh
Effects: When you knock out a foe, your Attack is +2 for 10 mins.

Name: Mount
Effects: As a free action, Calyrex can begin to ride you. While mounted, you both move using the Speed of Calyrex Ice or Shadow Rider. When acting, you both act at the same time and you both make attacks during the Calyrex Ice or Shadow Rider’s turn. You are only knocked out once Calyrex Ice or Shadow Rider is knocked out. As a free action, Calyrex can dismount. Whenever Calyrex dismounts from you, your HP is set to 100.

Name: Grim Neigh
Effects: When you knock out a foe, your Special Attack is +2 for 10 mins

Name: Rider
Effects: As a free action, Calyrex can mount Glastrier or Spectrier to become Calyrex Ice Rider or Calyrex Shadow Rider respectively. Whenever you mount, you recover to full HP in your new form. You gain all of the moves of Glastrier or Spectrier when you mount them while retaining your moves. As a free action, you may also dismount. When you dismount, your mount is set to their full HP, but you lose HP from your full HP equal to the amount of HP you lost while in your Ice Rider or Shadow Rider form.

Name: Unseen Fist
Effects: Your moves cannot be prevented by a Reaction move.

Name: Bad Dreams
Effects: Foes who are Asleep lose 20 HP on your turn when within 30 ft of you.

Name: Intrepid Sword
Effects: +6 Attack

Name: Relic of Heroes
Effects: If you are in possession of your Hero Relic, you are in your Crowned form.

Name: Dauntless Shield
Effects: +6 Defense

Name: Guardian of Sunlight
Effects: While in sunlight, you deal +1d12 damage with your attacks.

Name: Guardian of Moonlight
Effects: While in moonlight, you deal +1d12 damage with your attacks.

Name: Trespasser Hunter
Effects: Your attacks against Ultra Beasts, Solgaleo, or Lunala deal +1d12 damage.

Name: Neuroforce
Effects: Your super effective and extremely effective attacks add an additional die to their damage rolls. Super effective attacks made against you are treated as regular attacks. Extremely effective attacks made against you are treated as super effective attacks.

Name: Pillager of Light
Effects: Necrozma can possess Solgaleo to become its Dusk Mane form or Lunala to become its Dawn Wings form. If Necrozma is able to posses both of them, it becomes its Ultra Mantle form. Necrozma only needs to touch Solgaleo or Lunala to possess them. Solgaleo or Lunala can only escape from Necrozma once Necrozma is knocked out. Necrozma also gains the moves of whoever Necrozma is possessing. When separating from Lunala, Solgaleo, or both; if you had more HP than any of their individual max HPs they are set to their max HP, otherwise each Pokémon is set to the HP you were at when you separated.

Name: Primordial Sea
Effects: As a free action you may use Rain Dance ignoring its frequency.

Name: Master of the Sea
Effects: If you encounter Groudon, you are compelled to flood the lands and fight them.

Name: Master of the Land
Effects: If you encounter Kyogre, you are compelled to evaporate the seas and fight them.

Name: Desolate Land
Effects: As a free action you may use Sunny Day ignoring its frequency.

Name: Air Lock
Effects: As a free action you may use Defog ignoring its frequency.

Name: Master of the Skies
Effects: You are compelled to quell any fighting between Kyogre and Groudon.

Name: Delta Stream
Effects: Your foes do not add dice to their attacks for super effective or extremely effective attacks due to your Flying-type.

Name: Turboblaze
Effects: Your attacks ignore any passives that would redirect, negate or weaken them.

Name: Teravolt
Effects: Your attacks ignore any passives that would redirect, negate or weaken them.

Name: Terafrost
Effects: Your attacks ignore any passives that would redirect, negate or weaken them.

Name: Unity of Energy
Effects: Kyurem can fuse with Reshiram to become its White Fusion form or Zekrom to become its Black Fusion form. Kyurem only needs to touch Reshiram or Zekrom to combine with them. Reshiram or Zekrom can only part from Kyurem’s hold once Kyurem is knocked out. Kyurem also gains the moves of whoever Kyurem is fused with. When separating from Reshiram or Zekrom; if you had more HP than any of their individual max HPs they are set to their max HP, otherwise each Pokémon is set to the HP you were at when you separated.

Name: Fairy Aura
Effects: Fairy-type attacks deal +10 damage within 25ft of you

Name: Dark Aura
Effects: Dark-type attacks deal +10 damage within 25ft of you.

Name: Aura Break
Effects: Dark-type and Fairy-type type attacks deal -10 damage within 50ft of you. The Fairy Aura and Dark Aura Legendary Passives do not work within 50 ft of you

Name: Life of the Land
Effects: Zygarde operates as tens of thousands of individual cells that observe the ecosystem while spread across world. An individual cell cannot battle and has only 6 HP. When a group of ten are together, Zygarde can combine and act as its 10% form. When a group of one-hundred are together, Zygarde can combine and act as its 50% form. When a group at least three-hundred are together, Zygarde can combine and act as its Complete form. Higher forms have access to the moves and abilities of lesser Zygarde forms..

Name: God of Time
Effects: Dialga can warp time by either speeding it up, slowing it down, or stopping it altogether at-will. It can also travel through time to visit the past, present, and future. Others near Dialga when it freezes time may try and break free of manipulated time with a Concentration or Constitution check of 16 or higher on their turns (Pokémon do not add any modifiers).

Name: God of Space
Effects: Palkia can warp space by either making space harder to move through, easier to move through, or by halting things within it altogether at-will. It can also travel through space instantaneously to go anywhere it wants and can even move into parallel worlds. Others near Palkia when it manipulates space may try and break free of manipulated space with a Concentration or Constitution check of 16 or higher on their turns (Pokémon do not add any modifiers).

Name: Master of the Distortion World
Effects: Giratina can freely move between the Distortion World and the real world. When moving to and from the Distortion World, it opens a portal that remains open for five seconds. When in the Distortion World, or while bringing a shard of its power into the real world, Giratina is in its Origin Form. While in the real world, Giratina is in its Altered Form. In the Distortion World, Giratina can warp time and space at-will, travel through space instantaneously to go anywhere it wants, and travel through time to visit the past, present, and future. Others near Giratina when it manipulates time and space may try and break free of manipulated reality with a Concentration or Constitution check of 16 or higher on their turns (Pokémon do not add any modifiers).

Name: Darkest Day
Effects: Eternatus is a mobile Power Spot. It can Eternamax at-will as a free action and other Pokémon can Dynamax or Gigantamax when near it. Eternatus can remain Eternamaxed indefinitely. While Eternamaxed, it is treated as a Dynamax Pokémon, but may still use its non-Dynamax moves and is not restricted in its movement.

Name: Multitype
Effects: As a free action, or as a free reaction, you can change your type to any type once per round. You can change your type before your attack’s damage or even before taking damage. You cannot have more than one type at a time.

Name: Creator
Effects: Once per round, Arceus can gain any passive or legendary passive until their next turn. Arceus cannot gain the same passive or legendary passive this way more than once per combat.
